Today, we have curbside pick up until 5 pm and our online shop is open 24 hours a day. 
Thank you for your support and patience as we continue to be extremely cautious and vigilant. 

Out of an abundance of caution, the Early Mountain tasting room will be closed as of Thursday January 21st due to a single incident of Covid exposure amongst our team. While the exposure occurred away from the winery, we continue to take the health and safety of our team and community extremely seriously and will reopen after our staff is fully tested and we can assure the safety of our guests.
 
We appreciate your understanding and support. In the meantime, our Early Mountain wines continue to be available through our online shop and we look forward to seeing you soon.
